translated: They demonstrate to all sentient beings the ability to endure the amputation of all their major and minor body parts.

original: sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho ba tsams  kyang nyams su bzod par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis spyo ba dang / brgyad pa dang / smad pa dang / bskyung ba dang /

translated: and harming them. They demonstrate to all sentient beings the ability to endure without wavering, and they demonstrate to all sentient beings the ability to endure without becoming arrogant or conceited whether they are honored or not.

translated: They demonstrate to all sentient beings the absence of pride, and they demonstrate to all sentient beings the ability to endure the exhaustion of all phenomena.

original: ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes mi zad pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir /
translated: they were teaching the inexhaustible wisdom of the buddhas;🔽they were teaching the practice of patience in order to eliminate all the afflictions of all sentient beings;

original: bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi @340b mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /🔽sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: bzod pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi @340b mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
translated: they were teaching the pure, unsurpassed body of the tathāgatas to all sentient beings, and they were bringing sentient beings to full maturity.

original: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kya  lus kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te; sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs kya  lus kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / chu zheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te; sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas /
translated: From all his pores he emitted clouds of emanations equal to the number of all sentient beings, with various bodies, various colors, various shapes, and various sizes, and they pervaded all world systems in the ten directions, satisfying all sentient beings according to their aspirations.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la /🔽brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la / brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dor ba yang dag par ston pa dang / bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
translated: He revealed the diligence that is the forerunner of the great accumulation of omniscience, the diligence that scatters all the disturbances of Mara, the diligence that is unshakable and irreversible in the pursuit of enlightenment, the diligence of completely liberating all sentient beings from the ocean of samsara,

original: mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam pa bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
analyzed: mi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba'i lam thams cad rnam pa bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / mi shes pa'i ri rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
translated: the diligence of turning away from all the paths of leisurelessness, the lower realms, the lower migrations, and the lower destinies, the diligence of destroying the mountain of ignorance, the diligence of never tiring of making offerings and serving all tathagatas,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par blang ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor @341a *//

translated: the diligence of destroying and pulverizing the mountains of all obscurations,

original: ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
analyzed: ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bas mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
translated: the diligence of not being discouraged by bringing all beings to maturity and guiding them,🔽the diligence of purifying all buddha realms,

original: thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /
analyzed: thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing /
translated: and the diligence of the Tathāgata, which is unsurpassed and pure.

original: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
translated: He saw him teaching the Dharma in order to ripen beings.

original: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas /
translated: From all his pores

original: lus sna tshogs kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
analyzed: lus sna tshogs kha dog dang / dbyibs rnam pa tha dad par sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
translated: he emitted clouds of emanations of various bodies with different colors and shapes.

original: thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang /🔽dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang /
analyzed: thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrog pa dang / dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang / tshangs pa'i spyod pa bla na med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang / 'dod pa'i 'jig rten bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang /
translated: They bring joy to beings through various means, they dispel their unhappiness, they criticize all the pleasures of desire, and they proclaim the nature of shame in the world.🔽They establish beings in the restraint of the senses, they praise the unsurpassable conduct of Brahmā, they reveal the world of desire to be the domain of Māra, and they show it to be fearful.

original: 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongs su ston pa dang / chos la mos shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang / mthar gyis bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: They reveal to those who are free from the pleasures of desire all the objects of desire and pleasure in the world, they establish beings in the delight and interest in the Dharma, and they gradually introduce them to concentration, absorption, and the attainment of the higher knowledges.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams @341b cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su sten  pa dang /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams @341b cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su sten  pa dang /
translated: and the service of all the manifestations of the ocean of the samādhis of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston par byed cing /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su ston par byed cing /
translated: They were teaching the higher cognitions, manifestations, and displays of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / spro ba 'phel bar bya ba dang / nyams bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang / yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang / sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang / sems las su rung bar bya ba dang /
translated: They were causing all beings to be happy, increasing their enthusiasm, creating bliss, dispelling unhappiness, accomplishing faultless minds, and making their minds serviceable.

original: bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang / dbang po gsal bar bya ba dang / lus kyi bde ba yongs su skyed pa dang / chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
translated: I see that they are ripening beings by means of the purification of the mind, the clarification of the senses, the production of physical bliss, and the increase of the force of delight in the Dharma.

original: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te /
translated: From all their pores they emit clouds of bodies like all beings,

original: zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to manifest in the manner desired by all beings in all the realms.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
translated: They manifest the absence of weariness in going to the spiritual benefactors; they manifest the absence of weariness in serving and attending spiritual benefactors, masters, teachers, and gurus;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung @342a *//🔽bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang zhing yongs su bzung @342a *// bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang / sangs rgyas mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang dag par brjod pa dang / chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par 'byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang /
translated: He manifested the diligence of never tiring of taking up and upholding the turning of the Dharma wheel of all the tathāgatas.🔽He taught the way of comprehending all the oceans of buddhas, he opened the ocean of all the doors of the Dharma, he taught the characteristics,

original: rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang /
analyzed: rang bzhin dang / tshul mngon par brjod pa dang / chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi sgor yongs su ston pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang / the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sel bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang /
translated: nature, and mode of all phenomena, he taught the way of all phenomena being the door of samādhi, and he taught the domain of wisdom that clears away the ocean of the questions and doubts of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i ri shin tu 'joms pa'i shes rab rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang / sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su ston pa byed cing /
translated: They were teaching the vajra of wisdom that completely destroys the mountain of the views of all sentient beings, and they were teaching the rising of the orb of the sun of wisdom that dispels the darkness of ignorance of all sentient beings in a single instant of mind.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo //
translated: They were bringing sentient beings to maturity by causing all sentient beings to experience joy.

original: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
analyzed: ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang dbyibs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus mang po 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
translated: From all of their pores they emanated clouds of emanations equal to all beings, with bodies of inconceivable color and shape.

original: bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas /
analyzed: bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can thams cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas /
translated: They were present before all sentient beings according to their thoughts and aspirations, and they were teaching through various sounds.

original: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / @342b 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang / @342b 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang / khams gsum pa 'byung ba thams cad yongs su bstan pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang /
translated: He revealed the mundane and supramundane, the merit and demerit of the world, the movement of all mundane activities, the manifestation of all the elements of the three realms, and the direction of emergence from the three realms.

original: lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas /
analyzed: lta ba'i mya ngan mi bzad pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par bstan pas /
translated: He revealed the direction of emergence from all the terrible sufferings of views.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang / rim gror byas pa dang / rim gror ma byas pa la byams sdang gis gos pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang /
translated: He revealed the path of omniscience, the transcendence of the paths of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, and the absence of the stains of love and hatred toward those who are honored and those who are not honored.

original: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgol  mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /
analyzed: 'khor ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgol  mi gnas pa yang dag par ston pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyu ba rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang / snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing /
translated: the doors to saṃsāra and nirvāṇa, the uninterrupted display of passing from the Tuṣita realm to the next, and the uninterrupted display of going to the seat of awakening and attaining perfect buddhahood.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong ngo; ;ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su smin pa byed pa mthong ngo; ;ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang /
translated: I saw him ripening beings for omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te /
translated: From each of his pores came clouds of emanated bodies as numerous as the atoms in all buddha realms.

original: sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la mngon sum du gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug pa'i @343a *//

original: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste /

original: des sems can de dag la phog nas /

analyzed: byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang / spro ba dang / mos pa yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste /
translated: from that great tree of enlightenment there appeared a light called “the voice of the arising of the joy, delight, and faith of all beings.”

original: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
analyzed: des sems can de dag la phog nas /
translated: When it touched those beings,

analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes par gyur to //

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Noble son,

analyzed: de ltar 'od zer gyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul tshad med pa rnam pa de lta bus /

analyzed: lo stong du sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad nas zhag bdun pa la thug pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su bskyod pa'i tshul tshad med pas yongs su bskyod nas shin tu dag par byin gyis brlabs so //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ji snyed pa @374a *//
translated: All the pure buddha realms of all the tathāgatas of the ten directions,

original: rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang /
analyzed: rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang /

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su bstan par gyur to //

original: de nas zhag bdun pa tha ma la bab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur bar yongs su smin pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
analyzed: de nas zhag bdun pa tha ma la bab pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur bar yongs su smin pa de dag thams cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to //
translated: Then, in the last of the seven days, all the beings in that world-system who were ripe to see the Buddha turned toward the site of enlightenment.

original: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i khor yug thams cad dang / ri rab thams cad dang / ri thams cad dang / chu klung thams cad dang / rgya mtsho thams cad dang / shing thams cad dang / sa'i gzhi thams cad dang / grong khyer thams cad dang /
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i khor yug thams cad dang / ri rab thams cad dang / ri thams cad dang / chu klung thams cad dang / rgya mtsho thams cad dang / shing thams cad dang / sa'i gzhi thams cad dang / grong khyer thams cad dang /
translated: Then all the surrounding mountains, all the Sumerus, all the mountains, all the rivers, all the oceans, all the trees, all the ground, all the cities,

analyzed: ra ba thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / gzhal med khang thams cad dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / longs spyod thams cad dang / rol mo'i shing thams cad dang / rol mo brdung ba'i dbyangs thams cad dang / sprul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa re re las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang / mthu'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i spros dang / bdug spos thams cad kyi sprin mngon par 'thon te /
translated: From each of the visualizations of all the walls, all the abodes, all the palaces, all the clothes, all the ornaments, all the enjoyments, all the musical trees, all the sounds of the beating of music, and all the emanated ornaments, there emerged clouds of incense and perfume that resounded with the sound of the domain and power of all the tathāgatas.🔽From each of the visualizations of all the walls, all the abodes, all the palaces, all the clothes, all the ornaments, all the enjoyments, all the musical trees, all the sounds of the beating of music, and all the emanated ornaments, there emerged clouds of incense and perfume that resounded with the sound of the domain and power of all the tathāgatas.

original: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dang / spos dang / bdug spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro dam pa dang / spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang / gos rin po che dang / rgyan rin po che thams cad @374b kyi sprin dang /
analyzed: rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dang / spos dang / bdug spos thams cad kyi 'od 'phro dam pa dang / spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang / gos rin po che dang / rgyan rin po che thams cad @374b kyi sprin dang /
translated: From each of the visualizations of all the walls, all the abodes, all the palaces, all the clothes, all the ornaments, all the enjoyments, all the musical trees, all the sounds of the beating of music, and all the emanated ornaments, there emerged clouds of incense and perfume that resounded with the sound of the domain and power of all the tathāgatas.

original: rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin dang / phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin rnam par ston pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi ri rab kyi sprin dang / phye ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sprin rnam par ston pa /
translated: clouds of various powders displaying clouds of light rays of all tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa /
translated: clouds of the light mandalas of all tathagatas,

analyzed: rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sprin yongs su 'khrol zhing brdung ba /
translated: clouds of all musical instruments playing and sounding,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa /
translated: clouds of the sound of the aspirations of all tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho'i sprin rab tu sgrog pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang / gsung rgya mtsho'i sprin rab tu sgrog pa /
translated: clouds of the ocean of the melodious voices and speech of all tathagatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu ston pa byed cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i gzugs brnyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rab tu ston pa byed cing /
translated: and clouds displaying the various reflections of the major and minor marks of all tathagatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i ltas sngon du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba'i ltas sngon du byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan te /
translated: He revealed the inconceivable signs that had appeared in the past when the Thus-Gone One had come into the world.

original: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas /
translated: From the center of the petals of the great lotus of precious jewels,

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyan de'i padmo'i 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa chen po sha stag tu byas te 'khod do //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi rgyan de'i padmo'i 'khor rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa chen po sha stag tu byas te 'khod do //
translated: the adornment of light rays that revealed the domain of all thus-gone ones of the three times, there appeared a great lotus made of precious jewels.

original: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po'i 'khor gyi rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag gi ze ba dang / snying po la sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo chen po'i snying po can /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyal po'i padmo chen po'i 'khor gyi rin po che'i padmo chen po de dag gi ze ba dang / snying po la sengge'i khri rin po che'i padmo chen po'i snying po can /
translated: In the center of each of those great lotuses of precious jewels that surrounded the great lotus of precious jewels, there appeared lion thrones with the essence of great lotuses of precious jewels.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag byung bar gyur te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag byung bar gyur te /
translated: They were as numerous as the atoms in ten buddha realms.

original: rin po che'i @375a *//
analyzed: rin po che'i @375a *//
translated: The great lotus of precious jewels

original: snying po can gyi khri de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
analyzed: snying po can gyi khri de dag la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod par gyur to //
translated: On those precious thrones, bodhisattvas as numerous as the atoms in ten buddha realms sat down cross-legged.

original: bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de /🔽bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ye shes rin po che'i 'od kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas ma thag tu de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa mang po dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
translated: The blessed Thus-Gone Splendor of the Qualities of the Glorious Light of Precious Wisdom turned the wheel of Dharma for them.

original: sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas te /
translated: As soon as the blessed Thus-Gone Splendor of the Qualities of the Glorious Light of Precious Wisdom had attained unsurpassed and perfect awakening, many thus-gone ones in the worlds of the ten directions also attained unsurpassed and perfect awakening.

original: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyur to //
translated: They turned the wheel of Dharma in accordance with the wishes of sentient beings.

original: des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can tshad med pa rnams ngan song dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog go /
analyzed: des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can tshad med pa rnams ngan song dang log par ltung ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog go /
translated: He also turned away from all the lower realms and bad rebirths the countless sentient beings in those world systems.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni mtho ris su skye ba la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established in the higher realms countless sentient beings.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni nyan thos kyi sa la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established countless sentient beings in the state of the śrāvakas.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //🔽sems can tshad med pa ni shugs drag po 'od kyis 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so // sems can tshad med pa ni shugs drag po 'od kyis 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
translated: He ripened countless sentient beings for the enlightenment of the pratyekabuddhas.🔽He ripened countless sentient beings for the enlightenment of the powerful light rays.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni brtson 'grus dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par @375b byas so //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni brtson 'grus dri ma med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi byang chub tu yongs su smin par @375b byas so //
translated: He ripened countless sentient beings for the enlightenment of the stainless banner of diligence.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni chos rab tu bsgom pa'i gnas su 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni chos rab tu bsgom pa'i gnas su 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established countless sentient beings in the enlightenment of the abode of the practice of the Dharma.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa rab tu bsgom pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni dbang po yongs su dag pa rab tu bsgom pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
translated: countless beings were brought to maturity for the enlightenment that arises from the cultivation of the completely pure faculties;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni stobs mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par spyod pa khong du chud pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni stobs mnyam pa nyid la yang dag par spyod pa khong du chud pas 'byung ba'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so //
translated: countless beings were brought to maturity for the enlightenment that arises from the realization of the practice of the equality of the powers;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni chos grong khyer mngon du 'gyur ba'i yul gyi theg pa skye bas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni chos grong khyer mngon du 'gyur ba'i yul gyi theg pa skye bas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
translated: countless beings were established in the enlightenment that arises from the vehicle of the realm of the city of the Dharma;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi theg pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul tha mi dad pa'i tshul gyi theg pas 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
translated: countless beings were established in the enlightenment that arises from the vehicle of the way of the undifferentiated miraculous abilities that extend everywhere;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni spyod pa'i sbyor ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni spyod pa'i sbyor ba la yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do //
translated: countless beings were established in the enlightenment that arises from the way of being engaged in the practice of conduct.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do; ;sems can tshad med pa ni dmigs pa'i yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jug pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod do; ;sems can tshad med pa ni dmigs pa'i yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyi 'byung ba'i byang chub la rab tu bkod
translated: countless beings were established in the enlightenment that arises through the way of the maṇḍala of the complete purity of all objective referential points;

original: do // sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
analyzed: do // sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
translated: countless beings generated the mind of awakening of the bodhisattvas;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu bkod do //🔽sems can tshad med pa ni pha rol tu @376a *//
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam la rab tu bkod do // sems can tshad med pa ni pha rol tu @376a *//
translated: countless beings were established on the path of the bodhisattvas;

original: phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: phyin pa'i lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
translated: countless beings were established in the pure path of the perfections;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la rab tu bkod do //
translated: countless beings were established on the first bodhisattva level;

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga pa dang / drug pa dang / bdun pa dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established countless sentient beings in the second, third, fourth, fifth, sixth, seventh, eighth, ninth, and tenth bodhisattva stages.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established countless sentient beings in the tenth bodhisattva stage.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smon lam gyi khyad par can la btsud do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa smon lam gyi khyad par can la btsud do //
translated: He introduced countless sentient beings to the special prayers and conduct of bodhisattvas.

original: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
analyzed: sems can tshad med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam par dag pa la rab tu bkod do //
translated: He established countless sentient beings in the pure conduct and prayers of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang / rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas /
translated: In this way, through the inconceivable power and miracles of a buddha, that thus-gone one turned the wheel of Dharma.

original: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dul bar gyur to //
analyzed: sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dul bar gyur to //
translated: In each instant of mind, he brought to spiritual maturity beings of limitless and boundless realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku sna tshogs dang / thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos bstan pa yongs su shes par gyur to //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku sna tshogs dang / thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis bsgrubs pa'i chos bstan pa yongs su shes par gyur to //
translated: All the beings in that world-system understood the teachings of that tathagata, which were accomplished through various bodies and various skillful means.

original: rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i sems can du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / yul dang / longs spyod kyis rgyags shing dregs te /
analyzed: rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma'i sems can du gzugs dang / kha dog dang / yul dang / longs spyod kyis rgyags shing dregs te /
translated: In the royal palace Jewel Flower Lamp, the beings were arrogant and conceited because of their forms, colors, lands, and enjoyments.🔽They despised each other.

original: @376b gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa de rnams gdul ba'i don du /
analyzed: @376b gcig la gcig khyad du gsod pa de rnams gdul ba'i don du /
translated: In order to guide them,

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kha dog dang gzugs mchog tu byon par mngon par sprul te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos kha dog dang gzugs mchog tu byon par mngon par sprul te /
translated: the bodhisattva Samantabhadra emanated a supreme form and color.

original: rgyal po'i pho brang der phyin to //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba'i sems can 'byung ba'i nga ro rab tu bsgrags pas rnam par dmigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called “the proclamation of the Dharma wheel of all tathagatas,” the samadhi called “the observation of the ocean of all buddhas’ aspirations,” the samadhi called “the observation of the proclamation of the cries of all beings oppressed by the suffering of samsara,”

analyzed: de phra ba la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dang / mi g-yo ba'i sems dang / rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang / dbugs phyin pa'i sems dang / dpag tu med pa'i sems dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang /

translated: the mind that focuses on the profound omniscience, the mind that engages the ocean of the way of love, the mind that is exalted above all attachment, the mind that does not dwell on any worldly object,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog rgya mtshos snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / g-yo ba med pa'i sems dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs dang / kha dog rgya mtshos snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / g-yo ba med pa'i sems dang / khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang /
translated: the mind that engages the domain of the tathāgatas, the mind that is illuminated by the ocean of the forms and colors of all buddhas, the mind that is without disturbance, the mind that is without movement, the mind that is without anger,

original: mthon dman med pa'i sems dang / mi skyo ba'i sems dang / mi zlog pa'i sems dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang /
analyzed: mthon dman med pa'i sems dang / mi skyo ba'i sems dang / mi zlog pa'i sems dang / zhum pa med pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang /
translated: a mind without high or low, a mind without weariness, a mind without turning back, a mind without discouragement, a mind that has realized the nature of all phenomena, a mind that has followed the ocean of the ways of all phenomena,

original: chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas rgya @382b mtsho mang po'i snang ba yongs su skyes pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu 'byed pa'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang / sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i sems dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i sems dang / sangs rgyas rgya @382b mtsho mang po'i snang ba yongs su skyes pa'i sems dang /
translated: a mind that has followed the way of distinguishing all phenomena, a mind that has entered the ocean of all beings, a mind that has saved all beings, a mind that has been born from the light of the ocean of many buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spobs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i sems dang / sgrib pa thams cad kyi ri rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po yang dag par sgrub pa'i sems dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spobs pa mngon sum du gyur pa'i sems dang /
translated: the mind that engages the ocean of aspirations of all the tathāgatas, the mind that scatters the mountains of all obscurations, the mind that accomplishes the vast accumulation of merit, the mind that has the eloquence of the ten powers of the tathāgatas,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la snang ba thob pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i sems dang / phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sems dang ldan pas /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i yul thams cad la snang ba thob pa'i sems dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i sems dang / phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i sems dang ldan pas /
translated: the mind that has attained the illumination of the entire domain of bodhisattvas, the mind that increases all the accumulations of bodhisattvas, and the mind that fills the ocean of all directions.

original: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po la lhag par dmigs par bya bas /
analyzed: kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen po la lhag par dmigs par bya bas /

analyzed: smon lam rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi smon lam rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du mngon par bsgrub ste /

original: 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings 'byams klas pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par bya ba dang /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par bsgrub pa dang /

translated: to go into the presence of all the tathāgatas; to serve all the kalyāṇamitras; to complete the worship and service of all the tathāgatas; to accomplish the wisdom of omniscience in every instant of mind;

analyzed: rnam par 'tshang rgya bar bya bas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgyun mi gcod par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa la smon lam mngon par sgrub par gyur to //
